Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INTERNET AND TECHNOLOGY

Title: Establishes the "stop online predators act"
Summary: Establishes the "stop online predators act"; requires operators of covered platforms to conduct age verification to determine whether a user is a covered minor; requires operators of covered platforms to utilize certain default privacy settings for covered minors; requires operators of covered platforms to require parental approval of certain activity related to a covered minor's covered platform account.
LawCode: Ren Art 45-A to be Art 45-B, add Art 45-A §§1509 - 1517, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to establishing the stop online predators act
